game.name: Trade Empire
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Trade Empire is a trading strategy simulation set in the Medieval Age. Start trading in the city you choose and try to take over the entire map's trade and eliminate your competitors.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Trade Empire is a trading strategy simulation set in the Medieval Age. Start trading in the city you choose and try to take over the entire map's trade and eliminate your competitors.
